name: Broward Ruby Brigade
body:
Love the Ruby programming language and live in or near Broward County? Join the Broward Ruby Brigade! 

We meet every Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. at [Brew Urban Cafe](http://brewcoffeeshop.com) in the Victoria Park section of Fort Lauderdale, Fla. Stop by for a chat, coffee and code!

Follow us on Twitter at [@BrowardRb](http://twitter.com/BrowardRb).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
